    • Class cpusimulator.MainFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • model

          CPU16Model model
          Our CPU model.

        • datamem

          DataMemory16 datamem
          Memory to store data.

        • codemem

          InstructionMemory16 codemem
          Memory to store code.

        • bdatamem

          BreakpointMemory16 bdatamem
          Breakpointed data memory. Used to add data memory breakpoints.

        • bcodemem

          BreakpointMemory16 bcodemem
          Breakpointed code memory. Used to add code mmeory breakpoints.

        • display

          Display display
          This is our display device, attached to virtual memory.

        • keyboard

          Keyboard keyboard
          This is our keyboard device, attached to virtual memory.

        • manager

          CodeManager manager
          Code manager is used to assemble/disassemble code.

        • instructionTableChangeAccept

          boolean instructionTableChangeAccept
          This flag used to avoid endless recursion caused by data changing and data handling in the same class.

        • memoryTableChangeAccept

          boolean memoryTableChangeAccept
          This flag used to avoid endless recursion caused by data changing and data handling in the same class.

        • registersTableChangeAccept

          boolean registersTableChangeAccept
          This flag used to avoid endless recursion caused by data changing and data handling in the same class.

        • breakpointsTableChangeAccept

          boolean breakpointsTableChangeAccept
          This flag used to avoid endless recursion caused by data changing and data handling in the same class.

        • cpuInterrupted

          boolean cpuInterrupted
          This flag indicates CPU interruption state.

        • cpuRunning

          boolean cpuRunning
          This flag indicates CPU running state.

        • breakpointReadFail

          boolean breakpointReadFail
          This flag indicates that we have wrong breakpoint address in some case.

        • sourceEditor

          AsmSourceDialog sourceEditor
          Our source editor dialog instance.

        • breakpoints

          java.util.ArrayList<E> breakpoints
          Array of created breakpoints.

        • toCursorBreakpoint

          Breakpoint16 toCursorBreakpoint
          Breakpoint which is created and used only when we run code to cursor.
